ComicInfo.Summary:
With Brooks gone, how will the rest of the KIDZ crew survive the zombie apocalypse? Find out in this issue! Includes bonus section with extra material on “Spielberg’s tapes”, behind-the-scenes info, art, and more…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A (Honey I Shrunk the Kids Movie Poster Parody) | Nicolas Petrimaux | 1 | B | Cover B (Super 8 Movie Poster Parody) | Vittoria Macioci | 2 | C | Cover C | Boris Mirroir | 3 | D | Cover D | Simon D'Armini | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Foil Cover E (Honey I Shrunk the Kids Movie Poster Parody) | Nicolas Petrimaux | 5 |
